page.title: 06A Day at Home.
page.content: We get up early and put on play clothes like jeans and a sweater.We go and have a breakfast of bacon, eggs and cereal.Some of us have jobs to do like feeding rabbits,ducks or cows. Sometimes we go to the ice skating at Nottingham.You can spend 3 hours on the ice.For lunch we have chips and sausages.In the afternoon we sometimes watch television.We might call for a friend and play on our bikes again.We do wheelies and go scrambling.We play football and cricket or go on the swings.We have tea in front of the television.The tea could be pork pie and salad.We go to bed at 9.00pm. and read ourselves to sleep.
